attributes.action: Remove Scotlands covid passport restrictions for venues/events
attributes.additional_details: Remove the Scotland covid passport for entering events
attributes.background: It's against human rights, if I don't want the vaccine I shouldn't be forced to have it and I should be allowed to attend events,

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or House of Commons is responsible for.

The Scottish Government is responsible for the vaccine certification (or COVID passport) scheme in Scotland. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee.

If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here: http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Outlaw discrimination on the basis of vaccination status: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596004
